Kade Keith

Welcome

I am a Software Engineer residing in Austin, TX. I recently graduated from Texas A&M University, work at IBM's Mobile Innovation Lab, and am working part time on my Master's Degree in CS from Stanford. I specialize in HCI and Front-End Development.

In addition to computers, I'm into music, politics, golf, and comic books. I make art sometimes.

LinkedIn. GitHub. Twitter. Spotify.
